content: WDB-SDA 7/16 Auger bit Premium auger bit for fast, smooth drilling of deep holes in wood ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-feeding threaded tip for fast and easier drilling into wood Optimized helix for maximum drilling speed Special chrome surface coating increases wear resistance and provides a smooth drilling experience Wide flute design for efficient chip removal Applications Suitable for drilling in wood, heavy timber and nail-embedded wood Precise drilling ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: 7/16 in hexagonal Base material: Wood Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Connection end | 7/16 in hexagonal | Base material | Wood | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2113259 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 18L 1 - Package Size 1 pc - 2113255 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 18L 1 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2113251 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 18L 1 1/4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2113254 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 18L 1 3/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2113256 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 18L 11/16 - Package Size 1 pc - 2119537 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 24L 11/16 - Package Size 1 pc - 2113257 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 18L 13/16 - Package Size 1 pc - 2119538 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 24L 13/16 - Package Size 1 pc - 2113258 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 18L 15/16 - Package Size 1 pc - 2119539 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 24L 15/16 - Package Size 1 pc - 2113253 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 18L 5/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2113252 - Smooth-Drill Auger 7/16 HEX 18L 9/16 - Package Size 1 pc
